description:
Bubble plugin to connect with Microsoft Business Central via API.

With this plugin you will be able to connect Bubble apps to your Microsoft Business Central and access any data published by its standard API.

(At the moment, only read access is possible to companies, customers and its contacts data.
More standard web services will be added soon)
name: Business Central Connector
plugin_instructions:
Task 1: Register a Microsoft Entra application in Azure portal

Task 2: Set up the Microsoft Entra application in Business Central

Task 3: Configure Bubble Plugin Connector for Microsoft Business Central

Task 4: Get data from your Business Central

See instructions at: https://joseppages.notion.site/Microsoft-Business-Central-Connector-11523005c79c80238a77d96ed45577ec?pvs=4
